name: package-rater-monorepo
author: Aditya Sivathanu, Kevin Chang, Ellis Selznick

scripts.build: yarn workspace @package-rater/shared run build && yarn workspaces foreach -A --parallel --exclude @package-rater/shared run build
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach -A run clean && rm -rf coverage node_modules
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @package-rater/app dev" "yarn workspace @package-rater/server dev" "yarn workspace @package-rater/shared dev"
scripts.format: yarn prettier --write app/src cli/src server/src shared/src '*.json' '.github/workflows/*.yml'
scripts.lint: cd app && yarn lint; cd ../cli && yarn lint; cd ../server && yarn lint; cd ../shared; yarn lint
scripts.quality: yarn format && yarn lint && yarn clean
